paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

functional_data.summary: The study assessed disease progression in ATTRv patients using quantitative MRI metrics.

variants.additional_notes: Specific variants were not detailed in the text.
key_quotes: TTR mutations included: Val30Met (10 patients), Glu89Gln (2), Phe64Leu (1), Ser77Phe (1), and Val107Ile (1).

challenges: No specific variant notations or penetrance data were provided for individual cases.
extraction_metadata.notes: The paper provided general information about TTR mutations but lacked detailed penetrance data.
